pkgmetadata.longdescription: Integrated Taxonomic Information System Client // An interface to the Integrated Taxonomic Information System ('ITIS') (https://www.itis.gov). Includes functions to work with the 'ITIS' REST 'API' methods (https://www.itis.gov/ws_description.html), as well as the 'Solr' web service (https://www.itis.gov/solr_documentation.html).
